name: tsbi3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wn(wo(w1, wn(w2))), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wn(wo(w1, wn(w2))), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wo(w1, wn(w2))), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wb(w1, w2), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wb(w1, w2), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(wb(w1, w2), wo(w1, wn(w2)), wi(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w1, w2), wo(w1, wn(w2)))
-| wi(wb(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wb(w1, w2), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

stmt.origin: sylbi(wi(w2, w1), wo(w1, wn(w2)), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w2, w1), wo(w1, wn(w2)))
-| wb(wi(w2, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wi(w2, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(w2)), wo(w1, wn(w2)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical biimplication, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
